donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Prevention and Control of Tuberculosis in Southern Sudan: The key components of the project include increasing availability and accessibility to TB DOTS services in the targeted areas, improving the quality of TB DOTS, and increasing the demand for TB DOTS services. It also aims to strengthen health systems by provision of required equipment and technical advisory support to enhance the capacity of national institutions to deliver services.

project_title: Prevention and Control of Tuberculosis in Southern Sudan
